vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Gad living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Gen.46.16;
son of: Gad (H1410);
brother of: Ziphion (H6837), Haggi (H2291), Shuni (H7764), Ezbon (H0675), Eri (H6179) and Areli (H0692); also called Arod at Num.26.17;
Another name of a.rod (אֲרוֹד "Arod" H0720)
§ Arodi or Arodites = "I shall subdue: I shall roam"
descendants of Arod
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (a) אֲרוֹד   hijo de Gad; (b)   descendiente de Arod, Arodí
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞羅底 或 亞律族 这个形容詞在原文的意思是 "我將征服: 我將漫步"
亞律的後裔(創 46:16; 民 26:17)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚罗底 或 亚律族 这个形容词在原文的意思是 "我将征服: 我将漫步"
亚律的后裔(创 46:16; 民 26:17)
